医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现 Stapokibart 有望减少季节性过敏患者的鼻塞Stapokibart 作为季节性过敏性鼻炎 (SAR) 患者的疗效和安全性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Stapokibart-shows-promise-in-reducing-nasal-congestion-in-seasonal-allergy-病人-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Stapokibart-shows-promise-in-reducing-nasal-congestion-in-seasonal-allergy-病人-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2ce63e90-dedc-4c20-862f-a5e54024aa76 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:59:00 -0500 Stapokibart shows promise in reducing nasal congestion in seasonal allergy patients, study finds
研究发现，针对焦虑儿童的数字 CBT 效果与传统方法相当，并且成本更低如果数字增强、治疗师支持、家长主导的 CBT 是一种具有成本效益且临床有效的替代方案。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-digital-CBT-for-children-with-anxiety-delivers-on-par-with-traditional-methods-lowers-costs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Study-finds-digital-CBT-for-children-with-anxiety-delivers-on-par-with-traditional-methods-lowers-costs.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a34b6153-6ea5-49da-909a-1df2335eeac5 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 04:29:00 -0500 Study finds digital CBT for children with anxiety delivers on par with traditional methods, lowers costs
疫苗对感染艾滋病毒的孕妇是安全的，但免疫反应降低eClinicalMedicine 的一项荟萃​​分析发现，疫苗对于感染艾滋病毒的孕妇来说是安全的，与未感染艾滋病毒的孕妇相比，疫苗的免疫原性降低，但不良事件没有增加，这凸显了将其纳入疫苗试验的必要性。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Vaccines-safe-for-pregnant-women-with-HIV-but-show-reduced-immune-response.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/Vaccines-safe-for-pregnant-women-with-HIV-but-show-reduced-immune-response.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e15e270-cf55-4e5e-8e09-2904ed71b129 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:36:00 -0500 Vaccines safe for pregnant women with HIV but show reduced immune response
研究显示，怀孕期间使用 mRNA COVID 疫苗可降低新生儿问题的风险JAMA Network 的一项研究发现，孕妇接种 COVID-19 mRNA 疫苗不仅安全，而且还可以降低新生儿脑缺血、颅内出血和死亡率的风险，支持妊娠期间接种疫苗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/mRNA-COVID-vaccines-in-pregnancy-linked-to-lower-risk-of-neonatal-issues-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/mRNA-COVID-vaccines-in-pregnancy-linked-to-lower-risk-of-neonatal-issues-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3d4ba645-7f22-4232-b2b7-ee67c3d7b5e5 Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:21:00 -0500 mRNA COVID vaccines in pregnancy linked to lower risk of neonatal issues, study shows
研究发现，COVID-19 与老年人患痴呆症的风险较高有关研究表明，COVID-19 与 60 岁以上成年人新发痴呆症风险增加之间存在潜在联系，该风险与其他呼吸道感染的风险相似。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/COVID-19-linked-to-higher-dementia-risk-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240209/COVID-19-linked-to-higher-dementia-risk-in-older-adults-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c25516fc-ef7c-4ace-a5c9-cf8b175fa21c Fri, 09 Feb 2024 00:07:00 -0500 COVID-19 linked to higher dementia risk in older adults, study finds
针对衰老细胞的新疗法可以持久缓解糖尿病性黄斑水肿用 BCL-xL 抑制剂靶向视网膜中的衰老细胞有望成为糖尿病性黄斑水肿的持久治疗方法，有可能提供长期的视觉功能改善。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-treatment-targeting-aging-cells-could-offer- permanent-relief-for-diabetic-maulous-edema.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/New-treatment-targeting-aging-cells-could-offer- permanent-relief-for-diabetic-maulous-edema.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=590dbfdf-7304-4142-afa7-9fff5abb0a9d Thu, 08 Feb 2024 23:53:00 -0500 New treatment targeting aging cells could offer lasting relief for diabetic macular edema
机器学习工具读取大脑扫描以发现精神病的早期迹象使用机器学习工具可以在精神病发作之前进行预测，该工具可以将 MRI 脑部扫描分为健康人群和有精神病发作风险的人群。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Machine-learning-tool-reads-brain-scans-for-early-signs-of-psychosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Machine-learning-tool-reads-brain-scans-for-early-signs-of-psychosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=72bcc850-8cb3-436a-8816-6a2694bcd562 Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:50:00 -0500 Machine learning tool reads brain scans for early signs of psychosis
UT Health San Antonio科学家获得120万美元用于实施糖尿病前期早期干预措施超过三分之一的人患有糖尿病前期，其特点是血糖水平异常，尚未达到糖尿病范围，但与眼部、肾脏和神经系统疾病以及心血管死亡风险的显着增加相关。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/UT-Health-San-Antonio-scientist-receives-2412-million-to-implement-early-intervention-measures-for-pre-diabetes.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/UT-Health-San-Antonio-scientist-receives-2412-million-to-implement-early-intervention-measures-for-pre-diabetes.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=969ccab0-0043-4c35-a469-b0b4c539fdbf Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:39:00 -0500 UT Health San Antonio scientist receives $1.2 million to implement early intervention measures for pre-diabetes
研究发现，重复 PlGF 测试对先兆子痫无益新研究发现，无需重复进行单一测试即可加快孕妇严重疾病的诊断。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Repeat-PlGF-testing-for-pre-eclampsia-not-beneficial-research-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Repeat-PlGF-testing-for-pre-eclampsia-not-beneficial-research-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7d797775-fe8b-4fd1-a675-5655b66fa95d Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:29:46 -0500 Repeat PlGF testing for pre-eclampsia not beneficial, research finds
选择性雄激素受体调节剂对 ER 阳性乳腺癌患者具有抗肿瘤作用今天（2024 年 2 月 8 日）在《柳叶刀肿瘤学》上发表的一篇研究论文表明，药物 enobosarm（一种刺激男性性激素受体的选择性雄激素受体调节剂）对雌激素受体阳性乳腺癌患者具有抗肿瘤作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Selective-androgen-receptor-modulator-has-anti-tumor-effects-in-ER-positive-breast-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240208/Selective-androgen-receptor-modulator-has-anti-tumor-effects-in-ER-positive-breast-cancer-患者.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=80b589e7-5a5b-460a-8a59-54aa591f54dc Thu, 08 Feb 2024 22:03:09 -0500 Selective androgen receptor modulator has anti-tumor effects in ER-positive breast cancer patients
